nodes.text: The Permondiri Explorer was an old survey craft that, at one point in time, was used by the Jedi Order. The Bureau of Ships and Services Heritage Museum on Coruscant had in its possession an ancient navigational dataplaque from the starship which was eventually stolen and replaced with a forgery by crime lord Dryden Vos of the Crimson Dawn crime syndicate.

The Permondiri Explorer was first mentioned in Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, a 2018 canon reference book. It was previously first mentioned in Star Wars Legends in Han Solo's Revenge, which was released in 1979.
